sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; export default function Tooltip({message, onDeleteMessage, data}) { return (
{message}
  • Kategori: {data ? data.category: null}
  • Makam: {data ? data.mission: null}
  • Ad: {data ? data.name: null}
  • Soyad: {data ? data.surName : null}
  • Başlangıç : {data ? new Date(data.start).toISOString().slice(0,10) : null}
  • Bitiş : {data ? new Date(data.end).toISOString().slice(0,10) : null}
) }
